item.title: Rig-No-Jutsu
item.description: Here is a collection of Maya tools I created during daily work. Its only a few for now, but I have a few in the works that will be release soon. GitHub Repo: Download Name Description Github Color Changer For changing the color on controls and shapes. More Info Github Copy Vert Weight Tool for selecting and copying weight to verts. More Info
